title: Mini Test 01: Nền Tảng Ngữ Pháp & Từ Vựng Cơ Bản

questions.text: Mr. John ______ the marketing report right now.
questions.explain: Dấu hiệu 'right now' (ngay bây giờ) -> Dùng thì Hiện tại tiếp diễn.

questions.text: Please ______ the contract carefully before signing.
questions.explain: 'Review the contract' là cụm từ cố định: Xem xét lại hợp đồng.

questions.text: She ______ working here since 2010.
questions.explain: Dấu hiệu 'since 2010' -> Dùng thì Hiện tại hoàn thành tiếp diễn.

questions.text: The seminar will be held ______ the conference room.
questions.explain: Dùng 'in' cho không gian kín (in the room).

questions.text: If it ______ tomorrow, we will cancel the picnic.
questions.explain: Câu điều kiện loại 1: Mệnh đề IF dùng hiện tại đơn (rains).

questions.text: We are looking for a ______ candidate for this position.
questions.explain: Cần tính từ bổ nghĩa cho danh từ 'candidate' -> reliable (đáng tin cậy).

questions.text: The new policy is ______ than the old one.
questions.explain: So sánh hơn với tính từ ngắn (strict) -> stricter.

questions.text: All employees must ______ the safety regulations.
questions.explain: 'Follow' đi trực tiếp với tân ngữ. (Comply/Adhere phải đi với 'with'/'to').

questions.text: He usually ______ to work by bus.
questions.explain: Dấu hiệu 'usually' -> Hiện tại đơn với ngôi thứ 3 số ít -> goes.

questions.text: The ______ of the product launch was unexpected.
questions.explain: Sau mạo từ 'The' cần một Danh từ -> Success.

questions.text: I haven't seen him ______ last month.
questions.explain: Mốc thời gian (last month) trong thì HTHT -> dùng 'since'.

questions.text: Can you give me a ______ with this heavy box?
questions.explain: Cụm 'give someone a hand' = giúp đỡ ai đó.

questions.text: This is the book ______ I bought yesterday.
questions.explain: Mệnh đề quan hệ chỉ vật (book) -> dùng 'which'.

questions.text: The director made a strictly confidential ______.
questions.explain: Cần danh từ sau tính từ 'confidential' -> decision.

questions.text: By the time you arrive, we ______ the meeting.
questions.explain: Dấu hiệu 'By the time + hiện tại' -> Tương lai hoàn thành.

questions.text: Our goal is to ______ customer satisfaction.
questions.explain: Sau 'to' là động từ nguyên mẫu -> maximize.

questions.text: The package ______ delivered two days ago.
questions.explain: Dấu hiệu 'ago' -> Quá khứ đơn, câu bị động -> was delivered.

questions.text: They decided to ______ the meeting until next week.
Would you mind ______ the window?
He is highly ______ for the job.
questions.explain: To be + adv + Adj (qualified - đủ năng lực).

questions.text: Neither John ______ Mary knows the answer.
Please ______ the form in black ink.
It is important that he ______ on time.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc giả định (Subjunctive): It is important that S + V(nguyên thể).

questions.text: The cost of living has ______ dramatically.
questions.explain: 'Rise' là nội động từ (tự tăng lên). 'Raise' cần tân ngữ.

questions.text: Despite ______ tired, he finished the work.
We need to ______ our expenses.
I suggest ______ to the cinema.
The flight was canceled ______ bad weather.
She asked me where ______.
questions.explain: Câu tường thuật gián tiếp: Trật tự từ S + V (không đảo ngữ).

questions.text: He is ______ of managing the entire project.
questions.explain: Capable of + V-ing (Có khả năng làm gì).

title: Mini Test 02: Từ Vựng TOEIC & Ngữ Pháp Nâng Cao

questions.text: Had I known about the party, I ______ attended.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ câu điều kiện loại 3: Had + S + V3, S + would have + V3.

questions.text: The CEO ______ the importance of teamwork.
questions.explain: 'Emphasize' (nhấn mạnh) là ngoại động từ, đi trực tiếp với tân ngữ.

questions.text: ______ the rain, we went out.
Please keep this document ______.
questions.explain: Keep + O + Adj (Giữ cái gì ở trạng thái nào).

questions.text: The man ______ to you is my boss.
questions.explain: Rút gọn mệnh đề quan hệ dạng chủ động -> V-ing.

questions.text: We offer a wide ______ of products.
questions.explain: Cụm 'a wide variety of' = sự đa dạng.

questions.text: I am not used to ______ up so early.
questions.explain: To be used to + V-ing (Quen với việc gì).

questions.text: The merger will be ______ next month.
questions.explain: Bị động thì tương lai: will be + V3/ed.

questions.text: Scarcely had he arrived ______ the phone rang.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc đảo ngữ: Scarcely... when... (Vừa mới... thì...).

questions.text: This ticket is ______ for three days.
It was ______ a boring film that I fell asleep.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc: Such + (a/an) + Adj + N + that.

questions.text: We apologize for any ______ caused.
questions.explain: Apologize for + Noun (inconvenience - sự bất tiện).

questions.text: Let's go out, ______?
questions.explain: Câu hỏi đuôi của 'Let's' là 'shall we'.

questions.text: The factory is operating at full ______.
The higher the price, ______ the demand.
questions.explain: So sánh kép: The + so sánh hơn, the + so sánh hơn.

questions.text: Please ______ your receipt for proof of purchase.
I wish I ______ rich.
questions.explain: Câu ước không có thật ở hiện tại -> dùng 'were'.

questions.text: He is a ______ respected businessman.
questions.explain: Trạng từ 'highly' bổ nghĩa cho tính từ/phân từ 'respected'.

questions.text: Unless you hurry, you ______ the bus.
questions.explain: Unless = If not. Vế chính dùng tương lai đơn.

questions.text: The item is currently out of ______.
Do you know who ______ this computer?
questions.explain: Who làm chủ ngữ (số ít) -> động từ chia số ít (uses).

questions.text: We need to ______ a strategy soon.
By next year, I ______ here for 10 years.
questions.explain: Dấu hiệu 'By next year' + 'for...' -> Tương lai hoàn thành.

questions.text: He didn't ______ to the email.
Only when you grow up, ______ understand.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ với 'Only when' đứng đầu câu.

questions.text: The meeting was ______ due to lack of participants.
It's time we ______ home.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc 'It's time + S + V2/ed' (Đã đến lúc làm gì).

questions.text: Please sign at the ______.
questions.explain: 'At the bottom' = ở phía dưới cùng.

questions.text: No sooner had he left ______ it started to rain.
The warranty ______ in December.

title: Mini Test 03: Tổng Hợp Kiến Thức

questions.text: There is ______ coffee left.
questions.explain: Coffee là danh từ không đếm được. 'Left' hàm ý còn lại một chút -> 'a little'.

questions.text: He submitted his ______ yesterday.
questions.explain: Cần danh từ: Resignation (đơn từ chức).

questions.text: I suggest that Tom ______ harder.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc giả định: Suggest that S + V(nguyên thể).

questions.text: The hotel can ______ up to 500 guests.
questions.explain: Cần động từ 'accommodate' (chứa được, đáp ứng).

questions.text: Not only ______ late, but he also forgot his book.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ với 'Not only' đầu câu.

questions.text: They reached a ______ regarding the salary.
questions.explain: 'Reach a consensus' = đạt được sự đồng thuận.

questions.text: The girl ______ eyes are blue is my cousin.
questions.explain: Đại từ quan hệ chỉ sở hữu (whose eyes).

questions.text: We need to address this issue ______.
questions.explain: Cần trạng từ bổ nghĩa cho động từ 'address'.

questions.text: Would you like ______ tea?
questions.explain: Câu mời mọc lịch sự dùng 'some' (dù là câu hỏi).

questions.text: The project was completed ______ of schedule.
questions.explain: Cụm 'ahead of schedule' = trước thời hạn.

questions.text: He stopped ______ to buy a newspaper.
questions.explain: Stop to V = Dừng lại để làm gì.

questions.text: Please ______ the instructions carefully.
Neither of the students ______ passed the exam.
questions.explain: 'Neither of + N(số nhiều)' chia động từ số ít (has).

questions.text: The annual ______ will be held in London.
It is worth ______ this book.
questions.explain: It is worth + V-ing (Đáng để làm gì).

questions.text: He is responsible ______ hiring new staff.
I had my car ______ yesterday.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc nhờ vả bị động: Have + sth + V3/ed.

questions.text: The ______ of the new system is impressive.
questions.explain: Cần danh từ chỉ tính chất: Efficiency (hiệu quả).

questions.text: Hardly had I arrived when the phone ______.
questions.explain: Vế sau của cấu trúc Hardly... when chia quá khứ đơn.

questions.text: We are seeking ______ advice.
Five miles ______ a long distance to walk.
questions.explain: Khoảng cách, thời gian, tiền bạc luôn chia số ít.

questions.text: The manager ______ the proposal.
If I were you, I ______ that.
questions.explain: Câu điều kiện loại 2: S + would/could + V.

questions.text: Please ______ your seatbelt.
It's no use ______ to him.
questions.explain: It's no use + V-ing (Vô ích khi làm gì).

questions.text: The building is under ______.
She sings ______ than me.
questions.explain: So sánh hơn của trạng từ dài (sings -> beautifully).

questions.text: He ______ all his money in the stock market.
I look forward to ______ you.
The rent includes all ______.

title: Mini Test 04: Chủ Đề Văn Phòng & Công Sở

questions.text: All employees are required to attend the ______ training session.
Mr. Smith, ______ is the manager, will join us shortly.
questions.explain: Mệnh đề quan hệ không xác định (có dấu phẩy), chỉ người -> dùng 'who'.

questions.text: We need to ______ a contract with the new supplier.
questions.explain: Cần động từ nguyên mẫu sau 'to': Negotiate (đàm phán).

questions.text: The report ______ by the end of the day.
questions.explain: Câu bị động với modal verb: Must be + V3/ed.

questions.text: Please ______ your supervisor if you are sick.
He works ______ than anyone else in the office.
questions.explain: So sánh hơn của trạng từ ngắn 'hard' -> harder.

questions.text: The company offers a competitive ______ package.
questions.explain: 'Benefits package' = gói phúc lợi (lương thưởng, bảo hiểm...).

questions.text: I will wait here until she ______.
questions.explain: Mệnh đề trạng ngữ chỉ thời gian (sau until) dùng hiện tại đơn.

questions.text: We are looking for a ______ solution to the problem.
questions.explain: Cần tính từ: Feasible = khả thi.

questions.text: Neither the manager nor the staff ______ aware of the change.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc Neither... nor... chia động từ theo chủ ngữ gần nhất (the staff - số nhiều) -> were.

questions.text: Please ______ the attached file.
questions.explain: Câu mệnh lệnh: V nguyên mẫu + O.

questions.text: It is necessary that he ______ the meeting.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc giả định: It is necessary that S + V(nguyên thể).

questions.text: The ______ of the new product was successful.
questions.explain: 'Product launch' = Sự ra mắt sản phẩm.

questions.text: ______ being tired, he continued to work.
We apologize for the ______ in shipping.
questions.explain: Apologize for the delay (Xin lỗi vì sự chậm trễ).

questions.text: The higher the demand, ______ the price.
questions.explain: So sánh kép: The + so sánh hơn..., the + so sánh hơn...

questions.text: He was promoted to the position of ______ manager.
questions.explain: Assistant manager = Trợ lý giám đốc.

questions.text: If I ______ the time, I would help you.
questions.explain: Câu điều kiện loại 2 (giả định trái hiện tại) -> If + S + V2/ed.

questions.text: Please ______ detailed records of all transactions.
By the time he arrives, we ______ lunch.
questions.explain: Tương lai hoàn thành: Hành động hoàn tất trước 1 thời điểm tương lai.

questions.text: The goal is to increase ______ by 10%.
Would you mind ______ me a hand?
We need to ______ the budget proposal.
This is the room ______ we hold meetings.
questions.explain: Mệnh đề quan hệ chỉ nơi chốn -> where.

questions.text: The ______ requires 5 years of experience.
Hardly had the meeting started ______ the power went out.
Please ______ your application before Friday.
I suggest ______ by train.
The strategy was highly ______.
She asked if I ______ finished the report.
questions.explain: Câu tường thuật lùi thì: Hiện tại hoàn thành -> Quá khứ hoàn thành.

title: Mini Test 05: Du Lịch & Mua Sắm

questions.text: I would like to make a ______ for two nights.
questions.explain: Make a reservation = Đặt chỗ trước.

questions.text: Have you ever ______ to Paris?
questions.explain: Have been to = Đã từng đến và đã về.

questions.text: The flight was ______ due to bad weather.
She travels ______ than her sister.
questions.explain: So sánh hơn của trạng từ dài.

questions.text: Please show your ______ pass at the gate.
questions.explain: Boarding pass = Thẻ lên máy bay.

questions.text: If I ______ rich, I would travel the world.
This item is currently out of ______.
Do you know where ______?
questions.explain: Câu hỏi gián tiếp: Từ để hỏi + S + V.

questions.text: Can I pay by ______ card?
This bag is ______ heavy for me to carry.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc: Too + adj + (for sb) + to V.

questions.text: The store offers a full ______ within 30 days.
I enjoy ______ souvenirs when travelling.
The tour guide was very ______.
questions.explain: Cần tính từ: Knowledgeable = Am hiểu.

questions.text: They ______ in London since 2015.
questions.explain: Since + mốc thời gian -> Hiện tại hoàn thành.

questions.text: We booked a ______ room with a sea view.
He is the man ______ car was stolen.
Please check your ______ before leaving.
I suggest ______ a taxi.
Is there a discount ______ bulk orders?
She asked me if I ______ travel alone.
questions.explain: Câu tường thuật: Lùi thì Can -> Could.

questions.text: The itinerary includes a ______ to the museum.
questions.explain: A visit (danh từ) = chuyến tham quan.

questions.text: It takes 2 hours ______ to the airport.
We need to ______ our flight confirmation.
Not only ______ beautiful, but it is also cheap.
The ______ of living in this city is high.
questions.explain: Cost of living = Chi phí sinh hoạt.

questions.text: I wish I ______ longer on vacation.
Can I have the ______ please?
questions.explain: The bill/check = Hóa đơn thanh toán.

questions.text: This is the best hotel I have ______ stayed in.
questions.explain: So sánh nhất + Present Perfect + ever.

questions.text: The shop is ______ from 9am to 9pm.
Unless you book early, you ______ a room.
questions.explain: Unless = If not. Vế chính chia tương lai.

title: Mini Test 06: Tổng Hợp Ngữ Pháp Khó & Cụm Từ

questions.text: Only by working hard ______ succeed.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ với 'Only by + Ving' + Trợ động từ + S + V.

questions.text: We need to conduct a thorough ______.
questions.explain: Cần danh từ sau tính từ 'thorough' -> Inspection.

questions.text: It is high time we ______ home.
questions.explain: It is high time + S + V(quá khứ).

questions.text: He is ______ to the new policy.
questions.explain: To be opposed to + V-ing/N (Phản đối cái gì).

questions.text: ______ she rich, she would buy that house.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ câu điều kiện loại 2: Were + S + ... (bỏ If).

questions.text: The company decided to ______ its operations.
questions.explain: Expand operations = Mở rộng hoạt động.

questions.text: I'd rather you ______ smoke here.
questions.explain: Would rather + S + V(quá khứ): Muốn ai đó làm gì.

questions.text: Please ______ from smoking in this area.
questions.explain: Refrain from = Kiềm chế, tránh làm gì.

questions.text: No matter what ______ , I will support you.
questions.explain: No matter what happens = Dù chuyện gì xảy ra.

questions.text: We must ______ with the regulations.
Not until yesterday ______ the truth.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ: Not until... + Trợ động từ + S + V.

questions.text: The seminar was very ______.
questions.explain: Informative = Nhiều thông tin bổ ích.

questions.text: It appears ______ raining.
He made a significant ______ to the project.
questions.explain: Make a contribution to = Đóng góp vào.

questions.text: ______ of the two plans is better?
questions.explain: Which of... (Lựa chọn trong số lượng xác định).

questions.text: The machine is currently out of ______.
Let's discuss this, ______?
questions.explain: Tag question của Let's -> shall we.

questions.text: I have to ______ a presentation tomorrow.
Try ______ quiet, the baby is sleeping.
questions.explain: Try to V = Cố gắng làm gì.

questions.text: We need to ______ the problem immediately.
questions.explain: Address a problem = Giải quyết vấn đề.

questions.text: Had it not been for the rain, we ______ gone out.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ điều kiện loại 3: Had it not been for... S + would have + V3.

questions.text: He is a man of ______.
questions.explain: Man of integrity = Người chính trực.

questions.text: Little ______ that he was being watched.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ với từ phủ định 'Little' đứng đầu -> Little did he know.

questions.text: The contract is ______ for renewal.
questions.explain: Due for renewal = Đến hạn gia hạn.

questions.text: I suggest that he ______ a doctor.
questions.explain: Giả định thức: Suggest + S + V(nguyên thể).

questions.text: Please ______ your attention to the screen.
questions.explain: Direct attention to = Hướng sự chú ý vào.

questions.text: There's no point ______ about it.
questions.explain: There's no point + V-ing = Chẳng ích gì.

questions.text: The decision is ______.
questions.explain: Irrevocable = Không thể thay đổi được.

questions.text: On no account ______ this door be opened.
questions.explain: On no account should... = Không vì lý do gì mà...

questions.text: We reached a tentative ______.
questions.explain: Tentative agreement = Thỏa thuận tạm thời.

title: Mini Test 07: Marketing & Chiến Lược Kinh Doanh

questions.text: We need to identify our target ______.
questions.explain: Target audience = Khách hàng mục tiêu.

questions.text: It was not until midnight ______ home.
questions.explain: Cấu trúc nhấn mạnh: It was not until... that...

questions.text: The new campaign aims to increase brand ______.
questions.explain: Brand awareness = Độ nhận diện thương hiệu.

questions.text: ______ for the bus, I saw an accident.
questions.explain: Rút gọn mệnh đề cùng chủ ngữ (chủ động) -> Waiting.

questions.text: We distribute our products through various ______.
Not only ______ the project, but he also got a promotion.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ với Not only đứng đầu: Trợ động từ + S + V.

questions.text: The company creates ______ brochures.
questions.explain: Promotional brochures = Tờ rơi quảng cáo.

questions.text: Either you or I ______ wrong.
questions.explain: Either... or... chia theo chủ ngữ gần nhất (I) -> am.

questions.text: Competitors are trying to ______ our market share.
questions.explain: Capture market share = Chiếm lĩnh thị phần.

questions.text: She acts as if she ______ the boss.
questions.explain: As if (như thể là) diễn tả điều không thật -> dùng Were.

questions.text: We conducted a survey to gauge customer ______.
questions.explain: Customer satisfaction = Sự hài lòng của khách hàng.

questions.text: Let's go to the beach, ______?
questions.explain: Câu hỏi đuôi của Let's là Shall we.

questions.text: The product launch was a huge ______.
I prefer coffee ______ tea.
questions.explain: Prefer sth to sth (Thích cái gì hơn cái gì).

questions.text: We need to ______ a new marketing strategy.
questions.explain: Implement a strategy = Triển khai chiến lược.

questions.text: The number of students ______ increasing.
questions.explain: The number of + N(nhiều) + V(số ít).

questions.text: Please ______ the feedback form.
questions.explain: Complete the form = Hoàn thành mẫu đơn.

questions.text: Never ______ such a beautiful sight.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ với Never: Have I seen.

questions.text: The advertisement was very ______.
questions.explain: Tính từ: Persuasive = Có sức thuyết phục.

questions.text: It is essential that everyone ______ on time.
questions.explain: Giả định thức (Subjunctive): S + V nguyên thể.

questions.text: We offer a 10% ______ on bulk orders.
No sooner had I arrived ______ the phone rang.
Our goal is to ______ sales by 20%.
questions.explain: Boost sales = Thúc đẩy doanh số.

questions.text: A number of students ______ waiting.
questions.explain: A number of + N(nhiều) + V(số nhiều).

questions.text: The ______ of the product is guaranteed.
I remember ______ him somewhere.
questions.explain: Remember V-ing = Nhớ đã làm gì.

questions.text: We need to ______ with other companies.
If only I ______ known the answer.
The ______ for the event is mainly teenagers.
The more you study, ______ you become.
questions.explain: So sánh kép: The more... the smarter...

title: Mini Test 08: Tài Chính & Ngân Hàng

questions.text: We need to reduce our operating ______.
questions.explain: Operating expenses = Chi phí vận hành.

questions.text: The money ______ stolen yesterday.
questions.explain: Money là danh từ không đếm được (số ít). Quá khứ -> was.

questions.text: The exchange ______ fluctuates daily.
questions.explain: Exchange rate = Tỷ giá hối đoái.

questions.text: He suggested ______ in real estate.
Please ______ your signature at the bottom.
questions.explain: Verify signature = Xác thực chữ ký.

questions.text: It is said that he ______ a millionaire.
We are seeking a ______ advisor.
questions.explain: Financial advisor = Cố vấn tài chính.

questions.text: Hardly ______ entered the room when the alarm went off.
The bank approved the ______ application.
Twenty dollars ______ too much for this.
questions.explain: Số tiền luôn chia động từ số ít.

questions.text: Our ______ year ends in December.
I had the roof ______ yesterday.
Please check your bank ______.
questions.explain: Bank statement = Sao kê ngân hàng.

questions.text: Neither of the banks ______ open.
questions.explain: Neither of + N(số nhiều) -> V(số ít).

questions.text: We need to ______ the budget.
questions.explain: Allocate budget = Phân bổ ngân sách.

questions.text: By the time we arrive, the bank ______ closed.
The ______ increased by 5%.
He acts as though he ______ everything.
questions.explain: As though + Quá khứ giả định (trái thực tế).

questions.text: Investment in stocks involves ______.
questions.explain: Involve risk = Liên quan đến rủi ro.

questions.text: Only later ______ realize my mistake.
We need to ______ the accounts.
I wish I ______ more money.
The ______ was declined.
Not until 5 PM ______ open.
He declared ______.
questions.explain: Declare bankruptcy = Tuyên bố phá sản.

questions.text: It is worth ______ in gold.
Calculate the net ______.
If I ______ the lottery, I would buy a house.
The currency ______.
questions.explain: Currency can depreciate (mất giá) or appreciate (tăng giá).

questions.text: Would you mind ______ the contract?

title: Mini Test 09: Nhân Sự & Tuyển Dụng

questions.text: Please send your ______ to the HR department.
I look forward to ______ from you.
The company offers a generous ______ plan.
questions.explain: Pension plan = Chế độ lương hưu.

questions.text: The man ______ we met yesterday is the CEO.
questions.explain: Đại từ quan hệ đóng vai trò tân ngữ -> whom (hoặc who đều được, nhưng whom trang trọng hơn).

questions.text: She has excellent ______ skills.
questions.explain: Interpersonal skills = Kỹ năng giao tiếp ứng xử.

questions.text: Despite ______ qualified, he didn't get the job.
We are currently ______ for a sales manager.
I regret ______ you that you were not selected.
questions.explain: Regret to tell = Tiếc phải thông báo (tin xấu).

questions.text: He decided to ______ from his position.
It is important that he ______ prepared.
questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + V nguyên thể.

questions.text: The ______ process takes two weeks.
questions.explain: Hiring process = Quy trình tuyển dụng.

questions.text: By the time he retires, he ______ here for 30 years.
questions.explain: Tương lai hoàn thành (trước mốc thời gian nghỉ hưu).

questions.text: Employees are eligible ______ health insurance.
questions.explain: Eligible for = Đủ điều kiện cho cái gì.

questions.text: If I ______ the job, I would move to NY.
Please provide three ______.
questions.explain: References = Người tham khảo/Người giới thiệu.

questions.text: He admitted ______ the mistake.
What are your salary ______?
questions.explain: Salary expectations = Mức lương mong muốn.

questions.text: This is the applicant ______ CV I liked.
questions.explain: Whose CV = CV của người đó.

questions.text: She was ______ for her hard work.
questions.explain: Bị động: Was compensated (Được đền bù/thưởng).

questions.text: I'm used to ______ under pressure.
The probationary ______ lasts 3 months.
questions.explain: Probationary period = Thời gian thử việc.

questions.text: He asked me why ______ the previous job.
questions.explain: Câu tường thuật: Why + S + V.

questions.text: We value employee ______.
questions.explain: Employee retention = Sự giữ chân nhân viên.

questions.text: Not only ______ experienced, but he is also friendly.
The deadline is ______.
I would rather you ______ come late.
He was fired for ______.
Only by practicing ______ improve.
Fill in the ______ form.
If I ______ you, I would accept the offer.

title: Mini Test 10: Sản Xuất & Kiểm Soát Chất Lượng

questions.text: The factory operates on a 24-hour ______.
The goods ______ in China.
questions.explain: Câu bị động: Are manufactured (Được sản xuất).

questions.text: We need to increase our ______ capacity.
questions.explain: Production capacity = Năng lực sản xuất.

questions.text: Before ______ the factory, please wear a helmet.
All defective items must be ______.
The harder you work, ______ you produce.
questions.explain: So sánh kép: The harder... the more...

questions.text: We aim to maximize ______.
It is critical that safety gear ______ worn.
questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + be (nguyên thể) + V3/ed.

questions.text: The machine requires regular ______.
questions.explain: Regular maintenance = Bảo trì định kỳ.

questions.text: Unless the machine is fixed, we ______ production.
questions.explain: Unless = If not. Vế chính chia tương lai/hiện tại (can't).

questions.text: Raw ______ are stored in the warehouse.
By next month, we ______ 10,000 units.
questions.explain: Tương lai hoàn thành (trước mốc next month).

questions.text: The ______ line was stopped for repairs.
questions.explain: Assembly line = Dây chuyền lắp ráp.

questions.text: He suggested ______ the process.
We strictly ______ to safety standards.
questions.explain: Adhere to = Tuân thủ (Follow/Obey không đi với to).

questions.text: The equipment ______ yesterday.
This product comes with a one-year ______.
Neither the workers nor the supervisor ______ happy.
questions.explain: Chia theo chủ ngữ gần nhất (supervisor - số ít) -> is.

questions.text: The ______ process is fully automated.
questions.explain: Manufacturing process = Quy trình sản xuất.

questions.text: Only when the quality is checked ______ ship it.
We need to ______ the workflow.
questions.explain: Streamline = Tinh gọn/Hợp lý hóa quy trình.

questions.text: I wish the machine ______ breaking down.
questions.explain: Wish + would V (phàn nàn về điều gì đó).

questions.text: The inventory is checked ______.
questions.explain: Trạng từ bổ nghĩa cho động từ checked.

questions.text: It's no use ______ to fix it manually.
A ______ was found in the system.
Had we known about the flaw, we ______ it.
Production has been ______ halted.
The manager had the workers ______ overtime.
questions.explain: Have someone do something (V nguyên thể).

questions.text: We conduct random ______.
questions.explain: Inspections = Các cuộc thanh tra/kiểm tra.

questions.text: The plant, ______ was built in 1990, closes today.
questions.explain: Mệnh đề quan hệ không xác định chỉ vật -> Which.

title: Mini Test 11: Bất Động Sản & Nhà Ở

questions.text: The ______ signed the lease agreement.
If you pay now, you ______ a discount.

questions.explain: Fully furnished = Đầy đủ nội thất.

questions.explain: Real estate agent = Môi giới bất động sản.

questions.text: Not only ______ spacious, but it is also cheap.

questions.explain: In the suburbs = Ở vùng ngoại ô.

questions.text: I am used to ______ in an apartment.
Utilities are included in the ______.
By the time we move, they ______ the repairs.
Please sign the ______ agreement.
questions.explain: Lease agreement = Hợp đồng thuê nhà.

questions.text: ______ of the two houses do you prefer?
The landlord handles property ______.
questions.explain: Property management = Quản lý tài sản.

questions.text: There is ______ furniture in the room.
questions.explain: Furniture là N không đếm được -> dùng little.

questions.text: The ______ needs to be fixed.
questions.explain: The plumbing = Hệ thống ống nước.

questions.text: It is essential that the rent ______ paid on time.
questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + be (nguyên thể).

questions.text: This area is ______ for commercial use.
questions.explain: Zoned for = Được quy hoạch cho.

questions.text: He asked if the house ______ a garage.
We need to ______ the kitchen.

The ______ value has increased.
questions.explain: Property value = Giá trị bất động sản.

questions.text: Five thousand dollars ______ a good price.
Is the property ______?
I suggest ______ a professional inspector.
The ______ collects the rent monthly.
If I ______ you, I would rent this one.

title: Mini Test 12: Giao Thông & Phương Tiện

questions.text: He ______ to work by train every day.
questions.explain: Commutes = Đi làm (di chuyển quãng đường xa).

questions.text: The train ______ at 5 PM.
questions.explain: Lịch trình cố định -> Hiện tại đơn.

questions.text: Please pay the ______ at the toll booth.

Please show your ______ license.

questions.explain: Speed limit = Giới hạn tốc độ.

questions.text: Neither the bus nor the train ______ on time.
questions.explain: Neither... nor... chia theo chủ ngữ gần nhất (train - số ít).

questions.text: We need to ______ a vehicle.
questions.explain: Rent a vehicle (thuê xe ngắn hạn).

questions.text: The car needs ______.
questions.explain: Need + V-ing (Bị động: cần được rửa).

questions.text: Check the tire ______.

questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + be (nguyên thể).

questions.text: The shuttle bus runs ______.
questions.explain: Trạng từ bổ nghĩa cho runs.

questions.text: I remember ______ the keys here.
questions.explain: Remember V-ing = Nhớ đã làm gì.

questions.text: Public ______ is very convenient.

questions.text: Only by running ______ catch the bus.
The road is under ______.
Would you mind ______ me a lift?
Fasten your ______ belt.
The more you drive, ______ you get.

questions.explain: Fill the tank = Đổ đầy bình xăng.

questions.text: He asked where the nearest station ______.

questions.text: Please ______ the software to the latest version.
questions.explain: Upgrade the software = Nâng cấp phần mềm.

questions.text: The computer ______ I bought yesterday is fast.
questions.explain: Mệnh đề quan hệ chỉ vật -> Which.

questions.text: We need to ______ the database.
questions.explain: Access the database = Truy cập cơ sở dữ liệu.

questions.text: It is necessary that the password ______ confidential.
questions.explain: Giả định thức bị động: S + be + V3/ed.

questions.text: The server is currently ______.

questions.text: By next year, technology ______ significantly.

questions.explain: Suspicious attachments = Tệp đính kèm đáng ngờ.

questions.explain: Back up data = Sao lưu dữ liệu.

questions.explain: Activate account = Kích hoạt tài khoản.

questions.text: Not only ______ efficient, but it is also cheap.

questions.text: Regular exercise is beneficial ______ health.

questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + V nguyên thể.

questions.explain: Toxic fumes = Khí thải độc hại.

questions.text: The patient ______ by the doctor now.
questions.explain: Bị động tiếp diễn: Is being + V3/ed.

questions.text: If I ______ you, I would see a dentist.

Global ______ is a serious issue.
questions.explain: Global warming = Nóng lên toàn cầu.

questions.text: He suggested ______ a diet.

questions.explain: Twice a day = Hai lần một ngày.

questions.text: Hardly had we gone out ______ it rained.

questions.explain: Conserve energy = Tiết kiệm năng lượng.

questions.text: It takes effort ______ weight.

questions.text: Not only ______ fit, but he is also strong.

questions.explain: 3R: Giảm thiểu, Tái sử dụng, Tái chế.

questions.text: Only by exercising ______ stay healthy.

questions.text: All proceeds go to ______.

questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + be (nguyên thể).

questions.text: By the time we arrive, the party ______ started.

questions.explain: Chia theo chủ ngữ gần nhất (friends - số nhiều) -> are.

questions.explain: Seating capacity = Sức chứa chỗ ngồi.

questions.text: He suggested ______ the gala.

questions.text: Hardly had the music started ______ people danced.

Not only ______ food, but they also provided drinks.

questions.explain: Identification card (ID card) = Thẻ căn cước.

questions.text: Only by working together ______ succeed.

questions.text: The university increased its ______ fees.

questions.explain: Chia theo chủ ngữ gần nhất (teacher - số ít) -> is.

questions.explain: Enroll in = Ghi danh/Đăng ký học.

questions.text: It is essential that she ______ hard.
questions.explain: Giả định thức: S + V nguyên thể.

questions.text: The ______ starts in September.

questions.explain: Tương lai đơn (chỉ tuổi tác/sự thật hiển nhiên).

questions.explain: Admission requirements = Yêu cầu đầu vào.

questions.text: The exam was ______ difficult than expected.

questions.explain: Graduate from = Tốt nghiệp từ trường nào.

The campus has a large ______.
Not only ______ smart, but she is also hardworking.

questions.text: It takes 4 years ______ a degree.

questions.explain: Bị động điều kiện loại 2 đảo ngữ: Were I told (Nếu tôi bị bảo phải đi).

questions.text: Submit receipts for ______.
questions.explain: Reimbursement = Sự hoàn tiền/thanh toán công tác phí.

questions.text: By the time you get this, I ______.
This move is ______.
questions.explain: Unprecedented = Chưa từng có tiền lệ.

questions.text: ______ that he was tired, he kept working.
questions.explain: Despite the fact that... (Rút gọn 'the fact' vẫn hiểu ngầm hoặc Despite + Noun Clause).

questions.text: We aim to ______ communication.
questions.explain: Facilitate = Tạo điều kiện thuận lợi.

questions.text: Should you ______ assistance, call us.
questions.explain: Đảo ngữ điều kiện loại 1: Should + S + V(nguyên thể).

questions.text: The list is not ______.
Little ______ about the surprise.
Check the ______ for flight details.
He speaks as if he ______ an expert.
The project is in ______.
questions.explain: In jeopardy = Đang lâm nguy/Có nguy cơ thất bại.

questions.text: On no account ______ you touch this.
questions.explain: On no account should... (Tuyệt đối không).

questions.text: This rule is ______ to everyone.
The person to ______ I spoke was nice.
We need to ______ the workflow.
Only after the meeting ______ announce it.
The error was ______.
No sooner ______ arrived than he left.
Please ______ the document.
If need ______, I will come.
questions.explain: Cụm cố định: If need be = Nếu cần thiết.
